0:
[cyberpower-ups]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  desc = "CyberPower CP1500 AVR"
  pollinterval = 10

[upsmon]
  password  = "${SECRET_NUT_PASSWORD}"
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon primary

MONITOR cyber-power@localhost:3493 1 upsmon "${SECRET_NUT_PASSWORD}" primary
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15

1:
[cyberpower-ups]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  desc = "CyberPower CP1500 AVR"
  pollinterval = 10

[upsmon]
  password  = "${SECRET_NUT_PASSWORD}"
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon primary

MONITOR cyber-power@localhost:3493 1 upsmon "${SECRET_NUT_PASSWORD}" primary
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15

0:
[ups]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  desc = "APC Back-UPS RS 900G"
  vendorid = 051d
  productid = 0002
  serial = 3B1227X00136

[monuser]
  password = secret
  upsmon slave
[monmaster]
  password = secret
  upsmon master

[rack]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  pollinterval = 15
  desc = Rack UPS
if [ $(curl -s https://ipinfo.io/ip) = $(dig +short ${SECRET_GATEWAY}) ]; then exit 0; else exit $?; fi

/hr/charts.bitnami.com-bitnami-grafana.title: grafana helm release
/hr/charts.bitnami.com-bitnami-grafana.name: grafana
/hr/charts.bitnami.com-bitnami-grafana.doc: Grafana is an open-source data visualization and monitoring platform that provides support for various data sources such as Prometheus, InfluxDB, and Elasticsearch. It offers a wide range of customizable dashboards and panels that can be used to display and analyze data in real-time. Whether you are looking to monitor the performance of your home lab or simply want to visualize your data in a more meaningful way, Grafana has you covered. With its intuitive user interface and powerful visualization capabilities, it is a must-have tool for any home Kubernetes user.
